amendment.description: Amendment declares that it should be the policy of the United States to support measures to meet the immediate security needs of Afghanistan and requires the President to submit a strategy for meeting the immediate security needs in Afghanistan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment stating that U.S. policy should support measures to help meet the immediate security needs of Afghanistan, and requires the President to report to Congress within 45 days on a strategy for meeting the immediate and long-term security needs of Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lantos amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 407 - 4 (Roll no. 179).
